mil5.1.1:1.1: Atha kho milindo rājā katāvakāso nipacca garuno pāde sirasi añjaliṁ katvā etadavoca—
mil5.1.1:1.3: ‘yadi buddho pūjaṁ sādiyati, na parinibbuto buddho saṁyutto lokena antobhaviko lokasmiṁ lokasādhāraṇo, tasmā tassa kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:1.4_0: Yadi parinibbuto visaṁyutto lokena nissaṭo sabbabhavehi, tassa pūjā nuppajjati, parinibbuto
mil5.1.1:1.4_1: na kiñci sādiyati, asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti ubhato koṭiko
mil5.1.1:1.4_2: eso pañho, neso visayo appattamānasānaṁ, mahantānaṁ yeveso visayo, bhindetaṁ diṭṭhijālaṁ
mil5.1.1:1.4_3: ekaṁse ṭhapaya, taveso pañho anuppatto, anāgatānaṁ jinaputtānaṁ cakkhuṁ dehi paravādaniggahāyā”ti.
mil5.1.1:2.2: “parinibbuto, mahārāja, bhagavā, na ca bhagavā pūjaṁ sādiyati, bodhimūleyeva tathāgatassa sādiyanā pahīnā, kiṁ pana anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa.
mil5.1.1:4.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, putto vā pituno vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, pitā vā puttassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati,
mil5.1.1:4.2_1: na cetaṁ kāraṇaṁ paravādānaṁ niggahāya, pasādappakāsanaṁ nāmetaṁ, iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha
mil5.1.1:4.2_2: kāraṇaṁ sammā brūhi sakavādassa patiṭṭhāpanāya diṭṭhijālaviniveṭhanāyā”ti.
mil5.1.1:5.2_0: “parinibbuto, mahārāja, bhagavā, na ca bhagavā pūjaṁ sādiyati, asādiyantasseva tathāgatassa
mil5.1.1:5.2_1: devamanussā dhāturatanaṁ vatthuṁ karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇaratanārammaṇena sammāpaṭipattiṁ
mil5.1.1:6.1: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāaggikkhandho pajjalitvā nibbāyeyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, mahāaggikkhandho sādiyati tiṇakaṭṭhupādānan”ti?
mil5.1.1:6.2: “Jalamānopi so, bhante, mahāaggikkhandho tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṁ na sādiyati, kiṁ pana nibbuto upasanto acetano sādiya”ti?
mil5.1.1:6.3: “Tasmiṁ pana, mahārāja, aggikkhandhe uparate upasante loke aggi suñño hotī”ti.
mil5.1.1:6.4_0: “Na hi, bhante, kaṭṭhaṁ aggissa vatthu hoti upādānaṁ, ye keci manussā aggikāmā, te
mil5.1.1:6.4_1: attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena kaṭṭhaṁ manthayitvā aggiṁ nibbattetvā
mil5.1.1:6.5: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā bhavati ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
mil5.1.1:7.2: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddhasiriyā pajjali.
mil5.1.1:7.4: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā buddhasiriyā pajjalitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
mil5.1.1:7.5: Yathā, mahārāja, nibbuto aggikkhandho tiṇakaṭṭhupādānaṁ na sādiyati;
mil5.1.1:7.6: evameva kho lokahitassa sādiyanā pahīnā upasantā.
mil5.1.1:7.7_0: Yathā, mahārāja, manussā nibbute aggikkhandhe anupādāne attano thāmabalavīriyena
mil5.1.1:7.7_1: paccattapurisakārena kaṭṭhaṁ manthayitvā aggiṁ nibbattetvā tena agginā aggikaraṇīyāni kammāni karonti;
mil5.1.1:7.8_0: evameva kho devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhāturatanaṁ
mil5.1.1:7.8_1: vatthuṁ karitvā tathāgatassa ñāṇaratanārammaṇena sammāpaṭipattiṁ sevantā tisso sampattiyo
mil5.1.1:7.8_2: paṭilabhanti, imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva
mil5.1.1:8.1: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:8.2: Yathā, mahārāja, mahatimahāvāto vāyitvā uparameyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, uparato vāto sādiyati puna nibbattāpanan”ti?
mil5.1.1:8.3: “Na hi, bhante, uparatassa vātassa ābhogo vā manasikāro vā puna nibbattāpanāya”.
mil5.1.1:8.6: “Api nu tassa, mahārāja, uparatassa vātassa vātoti samaññā apagacchatī”ti?
mil5.1.1:8.7_0: “Na hi, bhante, tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni vātassa uppattiyā paccayā, ye keci manussā uṇhābhitattā
mil5.1.1:8.7_1: pariḷāhaparipīḷitā, te tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā attano thāmabalavīriyena paccattapurisakārena
mil5.1.1:8.7_2: taṁ nibbattetvā tena vātena uṇhaṁ nibbāpenti pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamentī”ti.
mil5.1.1:8.8: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā bhavati ‘asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphalo’ti.
mil5.1.1:9.2: evameva bhagavā dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā sītalamadhurasantasukhumamettāvātena upavāyi.
mil5.1.1:9.4: evameva bhagavā sītalamadhurasantasukhumamettāvātena upavāyitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
mil5.1.1:9.5: Yathā, mahārāja, uparato vāto puna nibbattāpanaṁ na sādiyati;
mil5.1.1:9.7: Yathā, mahārāja, te manussā uṇhābhitattā pariḷāhaparipīḷitā;
mil5.1.1:9.9: Yathā tālavaṇṭavidhūpanāni vātassa nibbattiyā paccayā honti;
mil5.1.1:9.10: evameva tathāgatassa dhātu ca ñāṇaratanañca paccayo hoti tissannaṁ sampattīnaṁ paṭilābhāya.
mil5.1.1:9.11: Yathā manussā uṇhābhitattā pariḷāhaparipīḷitā tālavaṇṭena vā vidhūpanena vā vātaṁ nibbattetvā uṇhaṁ nibbāpenti pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamenti;
mil5.1.1:9.12: evameva devamanussā tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātuñca ñāṇaratanañca pūjetvā kusalaṁ nibbattetvā tena kusalena tividhaggisantāpapariḷāhaṁ nibbāpenti vūpasamenti.
mil5.1.1:9.13: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:10.1: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi paravādānaṁ niggahāya.
mil5.1.1:10.2_0: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso bheriṁ ākoṭetvā saddaṁ nibbatteyya, yo so bherisaddo purisena
mil5.1.1:10.2_1: nibbattito, so saddo antaradhāyeyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, saddo sādiyati puna nibbattāpanan”ti?
mil5.1.1:10.3: “Na hi, bhante, antarahito so saddo, natthi tassa puna uppādāya ābhogo vā manasikāro vā, sakiṁ nibbatte bherisadde antarahite so bherisaddo samucchinno hoti.
mil5.1.1:10.4: Bherī pana, bhante, paccayo hoti saddassa nibbattiyā, atha puriso paccaye sati attajena vāyāmena bheriṁ akoṭetvā saddaṁ nibbattetī”ti.
mil5.1.1:11.1_1: dhāturatanañca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca satthāraṁ ṭhapayitvā sayaṁ anupādisesāya
mil5.1.1:11.1_2: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto, na ca parinibbute bhagavati sampattilābho upacchinno
mil5.1.1:11.1_3: hoti, bhavadukkhapaṭipīḷitā sattā dhāturatanañca dhammañca vinayañca anusiṭṭhañca
mil5.1.1:11.1_4: paccayaṁ karitvā sampattikāmā sampattiyo paṭilabhanti, imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena
mil5.1.1:11.1_5: tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:12.2_0: Kathitañca bhaṇitañca ācikkhitañca ‘siyā kho panānanda, tumhākaṁ evamassa atītasatthukaṁ
mil5.1.1:12.2_1: pāvacanaṁ natthi no satthāti, na kho panetaṁ, ānanda, evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, yo vo, ānanda,
mil5.1.1:12.2_2: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’ti.
mil5.1.1:12.3_0: Parinibbutassa tathāgatassa asādiyantassa kato adhikāro vañjho bhavati aphaloti,
mil5.1.1:12.3_1: taṁ tesaṁ titthiyānaṁ vacanaṁ micchā abhūtaṁ vitathaṁ alikaṁ viruddhaṁ viparītaṁ
mil5.1.1:13.1: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:13.2: Sādiyati nu kho, mahārāja, ayaṁ mahāpathavī ‘sabbabījāni mayi saṁviruhantū’”ti?
mil5.1.1:13.4: “Kissa pana tāni, mahārāja, bījāni asādiyantiyā mahāpathaviyā saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā hontī”ti?
mil5.1.1:13.5_0: “Asādiyantīpi, bhante, mahāpathavī tesaṁ bījānaṁ vatthu hoti paccayaṁ deti viruhanāya,
mil5.1.1:13.5_1: tāni bījāni taṁ vatthuṁ nissāya tena paccayena saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā
mil5.1.1:13.6: “Tena hi, mahārāja, titthiyā sake vāde naṭṭhā honti hatā viruddhā, sace te bhaṇanti—
mil5.1.1:14.1: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāpathavī, evaṁ tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
mil5.1.1:14.2: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāpathavī na kiñci sādiyati, evaṁ tathāgato na kiñci sādiyati.
mil5.1.1:14.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, tāni bījāni pathaviṁ nissāya saṁviruhitvā daḷhamūlajaṭāpatiṭṭhitā
mil5.1.1:14.3_1: khandhasārasākhāparivitthiṇṇā pupphaphaladharā honti, evaṁ devamanussā tathāgatassa
mil5.1.1:14.3_2: parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātuñca ñāṇaratanañca nissāya daḷhakusalamūlapatiṭṭhitā
mil5.1.1:14.3_4: imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro
mil5.1.1:15.1: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:15.2: Sādiyanti nu kho, mahārāja, ime oṭṭhā goṇā gadrabhā ajā pasū manussā antokucchismiṁ kimikulānaṁ sambhavan”ti?
mil5.1.1:15.4: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, kimayo tesaṁ asādiyantānaṁ antokucchismiṁ sambhavitvā bahuputtanattā vepullataṁ pāpuṇantī”ti?
mil5.1.1:15.5: “Pāpassa, bhante, kammassa balavatāya asādiyantānaṁyeva tesaṁ sattānaṁ antokucchismiṁ kimayo sambhavitvā bahuputtanattā vepullataṁ pāpuṇantī”ti.
mil5.1.1:15.6: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva dhātussa ca ñāṇārammaṇassa ca balavatāya tathāgate kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:16.1: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi yena kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:16.2: Sādiyanti nu kho, mahārāja, ime manussā ime aṭṭhanavuti rogā kāye nibbattantū”ti?
mil5.1.1:16.4: “Kissa pana te, mahārāja, rogā asādiyantānaṁ kāye nipatantī”ti?
mil5.1.1:16.6: “Yadi, mahārāja, pubbe kataṁ akusalaṁ idha vedanīyaṁ hoti, tena hi, mahārāja, pubbe katampi idha katampi kusalākusalaṁ kammaṁ avañjhaṁ bhavati saphalanti.
mil5.1.1:16.7: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:17.1: Sutapubbaṁ pana tayā, mahārāja, nandako nāma yakkho theraṁ sāriputtaṁ āsādayitvā pathaviṁ paviṭṭho”ti?
mil5.1.1:17.3: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, thero sāriputto sādiyi nandakassa yakkhassa mahāpathavigilanan”ti.
mil5.1.1:17.4: “Ubbattiyantepi, bhante, sadevake loke patamānepi chamāyaṁ candimasūriye vikirantepi sinerupabbatarāje thero sāriputto na parassa dukkhaṁ sādiyeyya.
mil5.1.1:17.6_0: Yena hetunā thero sāriputto kujjheyya vā dusseyya vā, so hetu therassa sāriputtassa
mil5.1.1:17.6_1: samūhato samucchinno, hetuno samugghātitattā, bhante, thero sāriputto jīvitahārakepi
mil5.1.1:17.7: “Yadi, mahārāja, thero sāriputto nandakassa yakkhassa pathavigilanaṁ na sādiyi, kissa pana nandako yakkho pathaviṁ paviṭṭho”ti?
mil5.1.1:17.9: “Yadi, mahārāja, akusalassa kammassa balavatāya nandako yakkho pathaviṁ paviṭṭho, asādiyantassāpi kato aparādho avañjho bhavati saphalo.
mil5.1.1:17.10: Tena hi, mahārāja, akusalassapi kammassa balavatāya asādiyantassa kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:17.11: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphaloti.
mil5.1.1:18.1: Kati nu kho te, mahārāja, manussā, ye etarahi mahāpathaviṁ paviṭṭhā, atthi te tattha savaṇan”ti?
mil5.1.1:18.4: “Ciñcamāṇavikā, bhante, suppabuddho ca sakko, devadatto ca thero, nandako ca yakkho, nando ca māṇavakoti.
mil5.1.1:18.5: Sutametaṁ, bhante, ime pañca janā mahāpathaviṁ paviṭṭhā”ti.
mil5.1.1:18.8: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, bhagavā vā sāvakā vā sādiyiṁsu imesaṁ mahāpathavipavisanan”ti?
mil5.1.1:18.10: “Tena hi, mahārāja, tathāgatassa parinibbutassa asādiyantasseva kato adhikāro avañjho bhavati saphalo”ti.
mil5.1.1:18.11_0: “Suviññāpito, bhante nāgasena, pañho gambhīro uttānīkato, guyhaṁ vidaṁsitaṁ, gaṇṭhi
mil5.1.1:18.11_1: bhinno, gahanaṁ agahanaṁ kataṁ, naṭṭhā paravādā, bhaggā kudiṭṭhī, nippabhā jātā kutitthiyā,
